title: German Health Minister Admits Permanent Vaccine Side Effects
cleaned_text:
German Health Minister Karl Lauterbach has been a key proponent of mandatory covid-19 vaccinations. On different occasions he claimed that the vaccine is “free” of side effects or “more or less free of side effects.” Today, the cry of the thousands experiencing severe uncurable side effects is sounding at his door.
• In August 2021, Lauterbach stated on Twitter “a minority of society does not want a vaccination without side effects, even though it is free and can save their lives and those of many others.”
• On one of the most popular evening shows he said, “Vaccinations are more or less free of side effects. That has to be said again and again.” And he did.
• Last June, Lauterbach first admitted that side effects occur and need to be studied, but he continued to claim that the benefits of vaccination outweighed the risks.
• In the meantime, the number of people suffering from the vaccine rose—ignored by the public, shunned by society, and left to suffer by the medical industry.
• On March 12, German broadcaster confronted the health minister, claiming that people with severe side effects are being ignored and no help was being offered by the government that pushed the vaccine and freed the vaccine companies from responsibilities.
• Lauterbach admitted to an “unfortunately” worded tweet and confirmed that some will remain permanently disabled.
• His solution? More science. Lauterbach believes that the study of the side effects will be the best thing going forward instead of dwelling on the past.

Our whole world has been deceived, including the fields of science and medicine (Revelation 12:9). Mankind has put its trust in false gods and false science (1 Timothy 6:20).

Request a free copy of The Plain Truth About Healing, by Herbert W. Armstrong, to understand how the scientific world got off track and what God’s solution is. Understanding the truth contained in this short booklet is more important today than ever.
